feature.label: MSP432 DriverLib (Target Content)
feature.description:
MSP432 DriverLib (Target Content)
msp432 DriverLib Target Content provides low-level peripheral driver support in the form of re-buildable C source code libraries.
Different versions of DriverLib Target Content can be chosen on a per-project basis via their project settings.
